entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
